utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh! That feels sooo good!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, lucky me! Coffee and a live sex show!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I'm sorry, what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... Oh, I'm sorry! I'm not... I was just-I was just reading to Emma.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: From... Cosmo??

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah... It's... "climax your way to better skin".

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: So, I have to go shopping today, which is my least favourite thing, I'm soo bad at picking out clothes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So you need someone who knows fashion, to tell you what looks good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not me, not me, not me, not me, not me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe you could take Charlie shopping.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, well...

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I'm sure you have better things to do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding? Rachel loves to shop! And she has great taste! Yeah, she's the one who taught me, you don't wear white after labour day and that you always, always, always have to put on underwear when you're trying on clothes.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: If you have the time, I'd really appreciate the help.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, uh-uh... Let's-Let's shop!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, you're gonna come back with some very classy clothes... ... and some slutty lingerie, SLUTTY!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, great! All right, bye! Pain in the ass!! That's off, right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's the matter, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh... Mike's sister just invited me to a party tonight, he's gonna be there. And she was like "Oh, don't worry! I asked him. He's totally ok with seeing you!". So now I have to go so he'll think that I'm totally ok with seeing him!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Which you're not, because you've totally hung up on him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Exactly!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And you're gonna want him to eat his heart out so you're gonna have to look fabulous!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I didn't even think about that! Aaargh, sexual politics!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, I'm-I'm taking Charlie shopping, why don't you come and I'll help you find something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, that'll be great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, ain't that nice? The three of you trying on slutty lingerie together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's not what we're gonna do!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why would you ruin it, who was that hurtin'?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! Fortunately she has a very pretty face!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I so can't believe this! My uterus is an inhospitable environment? I was trying so hard to be a good hostess!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I can't believe my sperm have low motility because, let me tell you, when I was growing up they sure seem to be in a hurry to get places!!

utterance.speaker: Doctor Connelly
utterance.content: Hi there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Doctor Connelly
utterance.content: I'm sorry there wasn't better news from your test last week but I wanted to talk to you about your options.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Doctor Connelly
utterance.content: Above all, even though your chances of conceiving through natural means aren't great, you never know! So, keep having sex on a regular basis.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, DAMN IT!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't worry, after a while he'll tune it out.

utterance.speaker: Doctor Connelly
utterance.content: Ok, given your situation, the options with the greatest chances for success would be surrogacy, or insemination using a sperm donor.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Doctor Connelly
utterance.content: And, of course, if you feel that neither of those is right for you, you can always adopt.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that a hint? Because we love you Doctor Connelly but we don't think we'd want you to be our child! Wow, talking about an inhospitable environment!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Ok, you're ready to go pick up Phoebe and go shopping?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh, yeah! Let's do it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, have a good time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not gonna find any clothes in there!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you guys!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Guess who's up for keynote speaker at the National Paleontology Conference?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Umh... Kurts Baley?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, right! What was last time he met a submission deadline for an abstract Well, why are you laughing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just... seeing what it'd be like to be a paleontologist... it's fun, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: So you're up for keynote speaker! Who's making the decisions?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Professor Sherman, yeah. I've a meeting with him today.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: He's a pretty tough guy to impress.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well... I think I know how to dazzle him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... you're not gonna do a magic trick, are ya?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Tsz... NO! .

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, you guys. Oh, I wanna ask you something. I-I I may get to speak at this paleontology convention and if I do, I'd love for you guys to come and hear me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think I can safely say that we all have family issues, work stuff and/or are sick.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's in Barbados.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But you come first!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm there!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: We'll see you, guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bye, see ya.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, so. How did it go at the fertility clinic?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not as much fun as last time. Apparently you only get porn if you're giving a sperm sample.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So-so what did the doctor say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well... there's surrogacy, but Monica has dreamt her whole life of carrying a child, she has felt that watching a surrogate would be... too hard for her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So you're ruling out surrogacy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, I don't have to learn what that means?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aside from adoption the only other choice is insemination, so... we're talking about sperm donors.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Enough said, I'm there for you man. Where is she, upstairs?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ah-ha!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How do you feel about all this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I wish there was an easier way for us to have a child but I don't think there is one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on Ross, be a good guy. Step up and do it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? NO! I am not going to give them Ben!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The data we are receiving from MRI scans and DNA testing of these fossils are - are staggering.

utterance.speaker: Professor Sherman
utterance.content: Mmm-mm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean, we've been accepting Leakey's dates as a given, but if they're off by even a hundred thousand years or so then you can - you can just throw most of our assumptions, you know, right in the trash. So-so what I am saying is - is is that is that the repercussions could be huge! I mean, not just in palaeontology, but if-if you think about it, in evolutionary biology, uh, genetics, geology, uh, I mean, truly the mind boggles!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that's not what you want...

utterance.speaker: Shop assistant
utterance.content: Incentive For Men?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'll take some of that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs, that's for men!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I know, this way when I go to the party later Mike will know I am over him cause I'm gonna smell like another guy. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok. Oh good, I'm dating a Russian cab driver. . Seriously does anyone buy this? I smell like beets!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: So, you know what, I really like those jackets with the shoulder pads on them. Where do you think those would be?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: On Melanie Griffith in "Working girl". I think what you want is over here.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: See, I told you I needed someone! Oh, you know, by the way, as a "thank you", I would really love to take you out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yeah! Actually Joey and I are going to the movies tonight, wanna come?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I can't. Because I-I've seen them.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: You've seen all the movies...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! I'm a big fan! Of the movies, you know. Motion pictures. The Talkies!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Rach, will you come with me to a dressing room?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Wha, you know, maybe we can do something else!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know that depends on what it is! I've done a lot of stuff.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So what were you doing out there, do you not like Charlie?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's ok, I just don't get a really good vibe from her!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know, you know, just the way she waltzed in here all smart, and tall! You know, and just swept Joey off his feet... I mean, nobody else has a chance!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who else?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anybody! You, me, you know, Monica's mom...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You like Joey?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shhhhh! Phoebe! All right, look. I have a little thing for him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's just physical and I have it totally under control! Ok? It's just, when I see them together, sometimes I just get a little jealous!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, wow! Isn't it ironic that he liked you and now you like him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I get it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh well, as long as it is under control, you know, you can't do anything about it, he's already dating her, and she is a nice person, that wouldn't be right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I know, so it is just not a big deal.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So can we keep this between us?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, great, because I gotta get out of here, the smell of beets is killing me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Any chance Charlie has a deaf twin?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi honey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Look I brought a friend for dinner, this is Zack, from work!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, of course, it's so nice to see you again, Zack!

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: You too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You guys haven't actually met before, but, boy! You're both polite! Go to have a seat Zack, and I'll get you a beer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got it.

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, Zack's pretty nice, uh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, how would you like to have a baby that's half yours and half his!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, we're talking about sperm donors and Zack may be the guy! I mean, look, he's intelligent, he's healthy, he's athletic, I mean, he is "spermtastic"!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, this is crazy! What did you even say to him! "Come up, meet my wife! Give us your sperm"!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I invited him to dinner so you could get a chance to get to know him! I mean, if we go through a sperm bank you never meet the guy, get to check him out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm telling you, he's great! I mean, even if my sperm worked fine, I'd think he'd be the way to go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm not going to be a part of this! You can't just bring some random guy at home and expect him to be our sperm donor!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Zack!

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Thanks! Do you have a coaster? I don't wanna make a ring.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Tell me about yourself, Zack!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, God, do you think she heard? It would be so bad if she heard!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, maybe she didn't hear! Ok I'm gonna go into that dressing room, you stay in here and I'll talk and see if you can hear me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thank God I can't hear a word that you're saying!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I didn't say anything yet!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, get back in there and talk!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm Rachel. It's so annoying when I put Emma on the phone to talk with my friends.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What!?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, some things are just hard to say to your face.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok well, I heard that! Which means that she heard it too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! We have a problem.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! What are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Stranger
utterance.content: Just be honest with her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Stranger
utterance.content: And it is annoying when parents put their baby on the phone...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright! Enough out of you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey! Hey, I need to talk to Charlie. Is she there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. no... eh... she went shopping with Rachel. Why? What's up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm meeting with professor Sherman about my being the keynote speaker...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! How's it going?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It could be better! He, uhm... he fell asleep!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What!? But I already bought my ticket to Bermuda!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Barbados.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine, I'll rent a car and drive...! Ross, you have to get that job!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What am I supposed to do? He's out cold! In fact he was just talking in his sleep before and evidently he wants someone named Fran to spank him harder.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, just wake him up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't! If he realizes that I'm the one that put him to sleep, I won't get the job!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh! That's a tough one. Oh! Wait a minute, this happened to me before! Yeah, I was auditioning for a play and the producer fell asleep and... no wait a minute... it was me who fell asleep... Yeah I mean hey, Shakespeare, how about a chase scene once in a while!?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys! Dinner's ready!

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Oh! I'm gonna go wash up first. Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So what do you think? I want that guys genes for my kid! Those eyes, those cheeckbones!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, there's enthusiastic and there's just plain gay!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don't like him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think he is fine! It's just that we don't know anything real about him... we should get more information.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright! Just follow my lead!

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: You guys have such a great place here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! Thanks, I'm crazy about our place. Hey! speaking of crazy... do you have a history of mental illness in the family?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Uhm... no. Although I did have an uncle who voted for Dukakis.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's really not the kind of thing we are looking for Zack.

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Okaaay... so eh... so tell me, how did you guys meet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, friends first, drunk in London, you know the story. I've got a better question for you: Do you or any of your blood relatives have diabetes?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: No...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Eh... Heart Disease, Alzheimers, gout?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: You guys don't have people for dinner a lot, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're just making conversation.

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Ok. I heard a joke today. It's pretty funny...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know what's not funny? Male Pattern Baldness

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Ok listen, you guys have shown a lot of interest in me tonight and I'm flattered and... and quite frankly a little frightened. Can we just talk about something else?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Ravioli's delicious!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I noticed you were enjoying that Ravioli with a beautiful set of teeth. Did you have braces as a child?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: No I didn't.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yess!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're teeth people Zack!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright! Let's just do it. Let's just go over there and see if she heard.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good plan.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok. Wha...? where? Where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! I'm sorry Rachel, I don't have time for your childish games, ok? I still have to go find something incredible to wear so I can beat Mike at "who's more over who"!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, hi! Hey, where've you been?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh! trying on clothes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Wi... in the dres... in the dressing room!? Well, that's so weird! Phoebe and I were just trying on clothes in the dressing room. God it's just such a small world!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Rachel... I heard you guys whispering.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God. You did. You heard. Ok, listen, let me explain.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: No! There's nothing to explain. I heard you. Phoebe likes Joey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: It's just that... I don't understand it... I mean, Phoebe likes Joey and then she comes here to buy a dress to impress another guy...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! That's Phoebe. That's Phoebe. You know, she just wants them all! It's like she's a nympho!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: You know, by the way. I heard you tell her not to do anything. Thanks for sticking up for me. You are such a nice person.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I try...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! You really want me to be the keynote speaker? Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Prof. Sherman
utterance.content: You're welcome.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! You look... ... stop-eating hot! Which is like the highest level of hotness!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you sure? Because I'm really dreading going to this party.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Then don't go!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mike knows I'm coming, and if I don't show up he'll think it's because of him! And I don't want to lose face! That's a very serious thing in my culture.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, then you go to that party and you pretend to be over Mike. And afterward you come to my place and I'll get you good and drunk!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You got it! Ok. But not on the wine that you made, ok, because I just don't want to go back to the Emergency Room.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: David?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Phoebe! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Wow, you look unbelievable.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. What-what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Well, I'm back from Minsk... permanently.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Well, remember how I was trying to achieve the positronic distillation of subatomic particles?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Well, after eight years of research I discovered that it can't be done.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it's great that you're back! How are you?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Good, good, life is good...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good!

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Ah well, I-I'm seeing someone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, good for you.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: She's also a scientist, so she's very smart and pretty and... well, it's actually because of you, really, that we're together, I mean, I saw what you had with that Mike guy, and I just said "Boy, I want that".

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mike and I broke up.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: You're kidding me. Because I'm not seeing anybody, I've just totally made that up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Yeah, I don't know why, I'm sorry, I guess I just didn't want to lose face.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I understand. Yeah. Ok so then ok, so we're both living in New York, not seeing anyone. That's so not like us!

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. Well... this is probably a stupid question, seeing that you look like that, but do you have some place that you need to be right now?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well... no.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Do you wanna get a drink?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'd love to.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Great.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Do you smell beets?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, got it, stay upwind of me.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Hey, there's Phoebe! Is that Mike she's with?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, that's David.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: There's a third guy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tip of the iceberg.

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: I'm gonna take off now. You're gonna let me go home, aren't you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You sure you don't wanna stick around a little longer?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: No, no, I should get home, I'm kinda tired.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you just tired now or are you always tired, 'cause that could be a sign of clinical depression.

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: No it's just tiring having to figure out the age at which all my grandparents died. I'll see you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think we've found our sperm!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Does seem pretty perfect.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, you think so, well? Should I ask him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not, just because his great-grandmother was obese, our kids are gonna get that from you anyway!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, that's not it. It's just that when we were asking him all those questions before, I just... I just realized I don't care if he's the most perfect guy in the world... he's not you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, he's better!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, he's not. And if I can't get pregnant with you, then I don't want to get pregnant by... him or anyone else.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm sure.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank God, because I don't wanna do this either. You know, I was just doing because I thought that was what you wanted to do. You know, I'm the husband, I'm supposed to... bring the sperm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is so sweet. I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you know this leaves us with...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Adoption.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How do you feel about that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think I feel ok about it. Actually I think I feel really good about it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me too. I wanna find a baby that needs a home and I wanna raise it with you. And I wanna mess it up in our own specific way.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So this is it, we're really gonna adopt?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, we're gonna be parents!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are gonna be great parents.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And it could be soon. I mean, think about it: right now, somewhere out there our baby could be being conceived.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait, if we're lucky, and we're really really really quiet, we may be able to hear the sound of a condom breaking!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, Zack!

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Hey Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I just wanted to apologize for last night. I got the feeling we made you a little uncomfortable.

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: No you didn't.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: No you did.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: My wife and I have some boundary issues, you know, sometimes we ask inappropriate questions. We're working on it.

utterance.speaker: Jeanette
utterance.content: Here are the boards for Friday's pitch .

utterance.speaker: Zack
utterance.content: Oh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You wouldn't know if Jeanette's planning on keeping her baby, would ya?
